titleStmt.title: A discourse discovering some mysteries of our new state, and remembring some fatall daies on both parties, the loyall and the rebell: betwixt a Protestand, a Puritan, and a Papist: shewing the rise and progresse of Englands unhappinesse, ab anno illo infortunato, 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
